title: Animal Well Review - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $30-off plus free shipping on their best-selling frame.

Bless hosts, Andy and Roger review Animal Well, and Greg reviews Cryptmaster!
